name: Majo Mail
description:
Majo Mail is a short cozy game where you play as a witch, that is helping villages deliver letters. Fly around the floating village, Chat to village on their island. Find out what they like and dislike!

With stickers and custom paints decorate mail and maps to make your deliveries more beautiful and faster!

Features

5 Villagers
Find out what villages like and dont like
free roam the skys
fill in the map with interesting details and info
peek at delivery location from your crystal ball
decorate letters for the fun new friends


Trailer Music by "Artificial.Music - Herbal Tea"
